mapper.select: SELECT userId, NICKNAME, userPwd, ROLES, NAME, MESSAGE, profileURL FROM USER WHERE userId = #{userId}
SELECT courseId, userId, courseName, BOOKMARK, heartCnt, openClose, color FROM COURSE WHERE userId = #{userId} AND myPinBoolean = 1
SELECT COURSEID, LOCATION, X, Y, DAY, visitDate, MEMO FROM COURSE_DETAIL WHERE userId = #{userId} AND courseId = #{courseId}

SELECT LC.courseId, LC.userId, C.courseName, C.BOOKMARK, C.heartCnt, C.openClose, C.color FROM LIKECOURSE LC JOIN COURSE C ON LC.courseId = C.courseId JOIN COURSE_DETAIL CD ON LC.courseId = CD.courseId WHERE LC.userId = C.userId AND LC.userId = #{userId}
